item.description:
@system wrote:

well you say they dont change and the problem is maybe you are not compiling? and i wouldnt start coding delta because it isnt really the easiest but its the best to work with the easiest but sloppiest is czar the cleanest and more complex is deltas well in my opinoin but try compiling and restarting server then the changes take effect
